I'm not familiar with Samba configuration, but comma's without spaces generally mean empty fields in a configuration file. They are quite common. just take a look at /etc/passwd
not sure what you mean...
empty feilds in a configuration file?

yes. Just look at /etc/passwd for an example. Human users generally have a home directory. Users made for servers have none because they do not login to the system, so the field normally used for home directory is empty, showing as (...,,...)
